metadata.topic_title: Mobile Site and Portable Recovery Solutions

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between using traditional hot sites versus mobile sites and portable recovery solutions for technology recovery in a cybersecurity incident. Consider factors like cost, deployment speed, security risks, and scalability. Support your arguments with real-world examples from BCP standards.
